org.deeplearning4j.optimize.api

Interface IterationListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivationMeanIterationListener, AssertWeightsDifferentIerationListener, BestScoreIterationListener, ComposableIterationListener, HistogramIterationListener, ParamAndGradientIterationListener, PlotFiltersIterationListener, ScoreIterationListener, UpdateActivationIterationListener, UpdateFilterIterationListener

    public interface IterationListener
extends java.io.Serializable
    Each epoch the listener is called, mainly used for debugging or visualizations
